Package ModuleTransaction.Orgcom

Class BasicOrganization

java.lang.Object
ModuleTransaction.Orgcom.BasicOrganization
All Implemented Interfaces:
Organization
public class BasicOrganization
extends java.lang.Object
implements Organization
The BasicOrganization class provides the functionality of a basic organization in the system.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    BasicOrganization()
    Creates the organization.

  • Constructor Details

    • BasicOrganization

      public BasicOrganization()
      Creates the organization. Must register (empty) transactions to create the genesys block.

    • registerTransactionsInLedger

      public int registerTransactionsInLedger()
      Add all possible transaction to the ledger. The sender needs to have a token token to send a transaction. If the sender does not have a token, the transaction is not added to a block to be added the ledger. All payable transaction are added to a block. The sender pay a token for each transaction. If any transaction is added to the block, the block is added to the ledger.
      Specified by:
      registerTransactionsInLedger in interface Organization
      Returns:
      the number of transaction added to the new block.

    • isValidLedger

      public boolean isValidLedger()
      Verifies if the ledger was not tampered. Verifies if the blocks are block and if the blocks previous hash on the ledger are consistent.
      Specified by:
      isValidLedger in interface Organization
      Returns:
      true if the ledger is valid, false otherwise.
